Title: Co-Founder
Description: When I was in high school my best mate Lucas and I volunteered on a food van operated by our school in Brisbane, Australia supporting people experiencing homelessness. We noticed that while there were lots of vans offering food, drinks, health checks, support and companionship there was one thing missing. There was no mobile free laundry service for people experiencing homelessness.   People using the vans had to use expensive Laundromats, try and access laundry services through short-term shelters or go without. They spoke of a loss of dignity and respect and poorer health through not being able to regularly wash clothing and other personal items.   In 2014, when Lucas and I were 20 years old we decided to change that and build a free mobile laundry van. In September 2014, our old van Sudsy was transformed and Orange Sky the charity was born.  Since then we've been working hard with our team of incredible staff, 2000+ volunteers, incredible supporters and service providers to support our friends (people experiencing homelessness) to positively connect with communities across Australia and New Zealand.  To date Orange Sky Australia has provided ‚óè over 280 shifts and 32 services in every state and territory each week ‚óè completed more than 1.2 million kilograms of washing; ‚óè provided more than 12,700 warm showers; and ‚óè most importantly, fostered over 207,000 hours of genuine and non-judgemental conversation on our six orange chairs.  I am always keen to connect with people who are passionate about making a difference and/or working with Orange Sky so please get in touch or find out more here - https://orangesky.org.au/

Title: Civil Marriage Celebrant
Description: Hey Friends, I'm Gambino, a civil marriage celebrant. Ever wanted to be married by a goofy groodle? Look no further!  It was one of my first ideas when my best friend Lucas asked if I could help him marry his best friend Matilda.   "If only I could hide behind Gambino!"  In all seriousness though, what's better than marrying your best friend, or your best friend's best friend, than being able to marry them both? So, I am now an authorised marriage celebrant.  I have a few ideas on how to approach this new career:  do it with Gambino, take people into nature to reflect and connect together,  or specialise in 2nd and 3rd weddings......  Who knows what it becomes, but let's give it a go! Find out more here:  https://lnkd.in/gwufhNxC

Title: Co-Founder
Description: Welcome to a place where cool ideas are seeded, nurtured and harvested. Where good people come together to grow. This is A Curious Tractor  Since I was a child I have loved tractors, in an effort to create space to explore ideas and act Ben Knight and I founded A Curious Tractor. A place to dream, do and deliver. Check out more at https://www.act.place/

Title: Founding Partner
Description: GLA brings together organisations, researchers, policymakers and doers working at the intersection of hygiene, dignity and public health. It‚Äôs not about one model or one way ‚Äî but a collective push for laundry access as a fundamental human right.

Title: Conductor In Residence
Description: A few months back, a mysterious card appeared on my desk. It was from the founders of Olive Express, Kim Chatterjee and Che Turner. Curiosity I visited their website and was instantly captivated. Inspired by their elder loved ones who cherished train journeys, they transformed an old van into an immersive virtual train experience for those who could no longer travel. The impact, however, stretches far beyond the screens displaying scenic journeys‚Äîit's about bringing joy, awe, nostalgia, and connection to our elders.     Since launching, requests have poured in from across the country, eager for the unique experience Olive Express offers. The vision? To expand this mission nationwide, utilising their vans, a dedicated team of volunteers, and the power of connection, even as the virtual train rolls on.    I'm excited to announce that I have joined Olive Express as their voluntary "Conductor In Residence," in collaboration with A Curious Tractor. My role is to help amplify this incredible mission and expand its impact throughout Australia.    If you're inspired to join this journey, reach out. I'm looking forward to welcoming you aboard. Choo Choo! üåü    #Innovation #SocialImpact #OliveExpress #ACuriousTractor #JoinTheJourney

Title: Caretaker
Description: Situated on the lands of the Jinibara people, Black Cockatoo Valley, Djunda Yina is a 150 acre property with views out to the top of the Mary River with creeks and forrest down to Elaman Creek.  With walking trails, creeks and plenty of space to explore find space to disconnect and recharge.  BCV is a working farm that is under construction so please be aware of other guest and projects on site.  https://www.hipcamp.com/en-AU/land/queensland-black-cockatoo-valley-v1qhej1q?adults=1&children=0

Title: Director
Description: The Stanford Australia Foundation (SAF) is an initiative of the Stanford Australia Association (SAA), which was established in 1987 to link the substantial group of Stanford alumni in Australia. Since 2008, the SAF has sought to build the capacity of the not-for-profit sector in Australia through scholarship. Our mission is to enable more Australians to share the exciting experience of a Stanford education for the benefit of the Australian community. Our flagship scholarship, the non-profit scholarship program provides an opportunity for senior executives in the Australian not-for-profit sector to undertake further study at the Stanford Graduate School of Business (GSB). SAF continues to seek opportunities and partnerships to support Australian non-profit and innovation leaders through scholarship.  The Stanford GSB is one of the world‚Äôs leading business schools located in Palo Alto, California at the heart of Silicon Valley. The school fosters innovative solutions to social problems by enhancing the leadership, management and organisational capacity of individuals and institutions pursuing social value creation.

Title: Brand Ambassador
Description: Over the past few months I have had the pleasure of owning and experiencing the fully electric Tuatara ATV. I am so stoked with it I have offered to become a brand ambassador to help more people go green. If you want to come try it out for yourself get in touch!

Title: Obama Leader: Asia Pacific
Description: The Obama Foundation Leaders: Asia-Pacific Program is a one-year leadership development and community engagement program that seeks to inspire, empower, and connect emerging leaders from across the Asia-Pacific region.  In December 2019 - 200 emerging leaders from 33 nations and territories across the Asia-Pacific region will gather in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, to begin their journey in the Obama Foundation Leaders: Asia-Pacific program! Over the course of the five-day convening, President and Mrs. Obama, as well as other prominent speakers and thought leaders, will join the Leaders for discussions around progress and opportunity in the Asia-Pacific region and values-based leadership.  In addition to the plenary sessions, Leaders will participate in skill-building workshops, leadership development training, and a community service project, among other activities.

Title: Keynote Speaker
Description: Lucas and I are passionate about sharing the Orange Sky story and helping others.  Over the years we've delivered hundreds of tailored presentations on how you can unleash innovation, creativity, passion and leadership within your team to drive greater outcomes. Every dollar that we receive through public speaking is invested back into Orange Sky to support us continuing to help the 116,000 people experiencing homelessness in Australia everyday.  Get in touch with us here if you're interested us speaking at your next event, conference and/or meeting - https://orangesky.org.au/nic-lucas-orange-sky-virtual-speaking/

Title: Owner
Description: Queensland based production company which specialise in pre, post and live production. Established in 2009 provides a broad range of services with a high quality focus. fastforward.productions provide a equipment rentals for events, systems include sound, lighting and video.

Title: Vice Presidentee - Relationships
Description: Only T is Queensland's newest creative social experience and the world's first tee shirt brewhouse. The brainchild of three young Brisbane men, Only T's weekly tee parties give Brisbanites the unique opportunity to 'brew' their very own customised tee shirts and pots whilst enjoying some drinks and socialising with good company. Whether you're in the mood for a Peppermint tee with Juan or a White Jasmine bubble tee, a night at the Only T brewhouse in Windsor is all about rolling up your sleeves and having a laugh while you get your hands dirty. By the end of the night you'll be armed with your very own customised tee shirt and tee pot (concrete planter) to take home in a unique Gold Coast-produced tee bag. It may be the world's first tee shirt brewhouse, but no experience is necessary to be a sommelier at Only T - just grab an apron and get ready to get creative (and have a few drinks while you're at it). Only T's brewhouse is BYO, so why not skip your night out at the bar and get brewing instead?

Title: Collaborator
Description: Carlo Ratti Associati is a rapidly growing architectural practice based in Turin, Italy, with branches in Boston and London. Drawing on Carlo Ratti‚Äôs research at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology, the office is currently involved in many projects across the globe.

Title: Business Development / Project Manager
Description: Makr Shakr is a robotic bartender created in Turin, Italy, that explores the new dynamics of social creation and consumption. The installation allows users to design their own cocktail creations through a digital application, while digitally controlled robotic arms transform these designs into reality.  Instead of trying to replace a bartender with a robot, Makr Shakr aims to be a social experiment that looks at how people might embrace the new possibilities offered by digital manufacturing.

Title: Camera Operator and Editor | Seven News
Description: Cameraman/Editor employed full time by the Seven Network in Brisbane. I am fully proficient with our DNG FTP kits, involving shooting, cutting and FTPing our Pkg's. When on station I am required to undertake ingest and editing on Quantel systems. Field duties involve shooting and linking via analogue/digital links. Helicopter operators using FLIR technologies.

Title: Collaborator
Description: Worked in collaboration with the Senseable City Lab for the production of video and library material, and project based around how we can make cities smarter.
